name: Mimic Knight
description:
Hello!

The project is made for Mini Jam 103! In the game you have to become your own enemy to defeat a boss and reach the end of a dark forest!

Game Rules:

Reach the end of the dark forest defeting your enemies by becoming them! Someone is faster but another is stronger...

Find the right path to grant strong souls and survive boss battle to become the boss!

Controls (M&K and gamepad are avaliable):

  • LMB or X - attack
  • A, D or left stick - move left or right
  • Space or A - jump
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 or D-Pad Buttons - mimic enemy type (if avaliable)
  • Esc or Start - end attemp
